headline: From the Courts To the Slopes
abstract: For a tennis professional and his growing family, building a house near Lake Tahoe, Calif., was about more than just learning a new sport.
lead_paragraph: When Trent Tuckerâ€™s friend suggested he build a vacation house in the private community of Martis Camp, near Truckee, Calif., just north of Lake Tahoe, Mr. Tucker initially laughed it off.
